snippet.title: Duet Night Abyss - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the first Duet Night Abyss trailer for the upcoming fantasy adventure RPG from Pan Studio, Hero Entertainment. Step into a world of magic and machinery and battle demonic foes as two different protagonists in Duet Night Abyss. Test your skills with both ranged and melee weapons, from crossbows and sniper rifles to lethal blades as you venture out on reconnaissance and rescue missions. Get a look at the game's fast-paced combat in action in this exciting first trailer. Duet Night Abyss is coming to PC and mobile platforms.

#IGN #Gaming
